title: Orcish dagger/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Orcish_dagger "Orcish dagger")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| ) [![Orcish dagger.png](/images/8/8b/Orcish_dagger.png)](/wiki/File:Orcish_dagger.png) |                                                                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 名称                                                                                     | 兽人匕首                                                                                         |
| 外观                                                                                     | 粗糙匕首                                                                                         |
| 伤害（小型）                                                                                 | 1d3                                                                                          |
| 伤害（大型）                                                                                 | 1d3                                                                                          |
| 命中修正                                                                                   | +2                                                                                           |
| 武器技能类别                                                                                 | [匕首](/wiki/%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "匕首")                                                          |
| 规格                                                                                     | [单手](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%95%E6%89%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "单手 (page does not exist)") |
| 基础价                                                                                    | 4 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN") （+10/正数附魔等级）                                               |
| 重量                                                                                     | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)") |
| 材料                                                                                     | [铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")            |

**兽人匕首**（orcish dagger）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它使用[匕首](/wiki/%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "匕首")的武器[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")，和匕首一样既可用于[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")也可用作[发射物](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E7%89%A9 "发射物")。兽人匕首由[铁](/index.php?title=%E9%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "铁 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时，它的外观为**粗糙匕首**（crude dagger）。

[邪兽之牙](/index.php?title=%E9%82%AA%E5%85%BD%E4%B9%8B%E7%89%99\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "邪兽之牙 (page does not exist)")是一种[神器](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")类兽人匕首。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [3 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [4 Variants](#Variants)

  - [4.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [4.2 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [4.3 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [4.4 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [5 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的玩家在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人匕首[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。兽人族[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一把+1兽人匕首，兽人族[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")则会获得一堆+0兽人匕首[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

兽人匕首在随机生成的武器中占1.2%。

[兽人](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄2的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一把兽人匕首（[兽人萨满](/index.php?title=%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E8%90%A8%E6%BB%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "兽人萨满 (page does not exist)")除外）[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

所有[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")在生成时有约1%的概率获得一把兽人匕首[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)。[盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有1⁄4的概率会是一把兽人匕首[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

## 策略

兽人匕首一般是玩家最早会在地牢里获得的武器之一。它对所有怪物的伤害都是d3，是游戏中最弱的武器之一。对于需要在游戏前期锻炼匕首技能的角色，兽人匕首仍有一定实用性。兽人族使用匕首有[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")加成，因此兽人盗贼玩家可以考虑在得到一堆更好的匕首之前利用自带的兽人匕首。

## 历史

兽人匕首最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Orcish_dagger/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), upgrading an orcish dagger will produce a standard dagger.

Kobolds in SLASH'EM have an effective 3⁄8 chance of generating with an orcish dagger.[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), orcish daggers deal d3 damage to small monsters and d5 to large monsters, and have a +1 to-hit bonus. Orcish characters in roles that would start with daggers, [knives](/wiki/Knives "Knives") or [athames](/wiki/Athame "Athame") will instead start with orcish daggers replacing each of them.

Grimtooth can be created by naming any orcish dagger, and favors orcs. It has +d5 to-hit, warns of [elves](/wiki/Elf_\(monster_attribute\) "Elf (monster attribute)"), [dwarves](/wiki/Dwarf_\(monster_attribute\) "Dwarf (monster attribute)") and [humans](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)") while carried, and deals double damage against them; it can also be [twoweaponed](/wiki/Twoweapon "Twoweapon") in the offhand.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), an orcish dagger can be created at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining 2 [orcish arrows](/wiki/Orcish_arrow "Orcish arrow") and a knife. Orcish daggers can be used at a forge to create a few items:

- An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 orcish arrows to create an [orcish spear](/wiki/Orcish_spear "Orcish spear").
- An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 [crossbow bolts](/wiki/Crossbow_bolt "Crossbow bolt") to create an [orcish short sword](/wiki/Orcish_short_sword "Orcish short sword").
- An orcish dagger can be combined with a [mace](/wiki/Mace "Mace") to create an [orcish morning star](/wiki/Orcish_morning_star "Orcish morning star").
- An orcish dagger can be combined with a [dented pot](/wiki/Dented_pot "Dented pot") to create an [orcish helm](/wiki/Orcish_helm "Orcish helm").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading a [great dagger](/wiki/Great_dagger "Great dagger") will produce an orcish dagger. Forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 858](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L858)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 114](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L114)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 125](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L125)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 213](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L213): *起始物品根据角色种族而发生替换*
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 426](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L426)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 155](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L155)
7. [↑](#cite_ref-7) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 229](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L229)
8. [↑](#cite_ref-8) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 851](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line851 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Orcish dagger/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Orcish dagger
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
)
名称 兽人匕首
外观 粗糙匕首
伤害（小型） 1d3
伤害（大型） 1d3
命中修正 +2
武器技能类别 匕首
规格 单手
基础价 4 zm
（+10/正数附魔等级）
重量 10
材料 铁

兽人匕首（orcish dagger）是NetHack中的一种武器。它使用匕首的武器技能，和匕首一样既可用于近战也可用作发射物。兽人匕首由铁制成，未鉴定时，它的外观为粗糙匕首（crude dagger）。

邪兽之牙是一种神器类兽人匕首。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 策略
  • 3 历史
  • 4 Variants
    • 4.1 SLASH'EM
    • 4.2 dNetHack
    • 4.3 EvilHack
    • 4.4 Hack'EM
  • 5 引用及注释

生成

兽人族的玩家在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人匕首[1]。兽人族游侠在游戏开始时会获得一把+1兽人匕首，兽人族盗贼则会获得一堆+0兽人匕首[2][3][4]。

兽人匕首在随机生成的武器中占1.2%。

兽人在生成时有1⁄2的概率携带一把兽人匕首（兽人萨满除外）[5]。

所有玩家怪物在生成时有约1%的概率获得一把兽人匕首[6]。盗贼职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有1⁄4的概率会是一把兽人匕首[7]。

策略

兽人匕首一般是玩家最早会在地牢里获得的武器之一。它对所有怪物的伤害都是d3，是游戏中最弱的武器之一。对于需要在游戏前期锻炼匕首技能的角色，兽人匕首仍有一定实用性。兽人族使用匕首有多重射击加成，因此兽人盗贼玩家可以考虑在得到一堆更好的匕首之前利用自带的兽人匕首。

历史

兽人匕首最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading an orcish dagger will produce a standard dagger.

Kobolds in SLASH'EM have an effective 3⁄8 chance of generating with an orcish dagger.[8]

dNetHack

In dNetHack, orcish daggers deal d3 damage to small monsters and d5 to large monsters, and have a +1 to-hit bonus. Orcish characters in roles that would start with daggers, knives or athames will instead start with orcish daggers replacing each of them.

Grimtooth can be created by naming any orcish dagger, and favors orcs. It has +d5 to-hit, warns of elves, dwarves and humans while carried, and deals double damage against them; it can also be twoweaponed in the offhand.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, an orcish dagger can be created at a forge by combining 2 orcish arrows and a knife. Orcish daggers can be used at a forge to create a few items:

  • An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 orcish arrows to create an orcish spear.
  • An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 crossbow bolts to create an orcish short sword.
  • An orcish dagger can be combined with a mace to create an orcish morning star.
  • An orcish dagger can be combined with a dented pot to create an orcish helm.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading a great dagger will produce an orcish dagger. Forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 858
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 114
  3. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 125
  4. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 213: 起始物品根据角色种族而发生替换
  5. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 426
  6. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 155
  7. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 229
  8. ↑ makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 851

{{weapon/zh-CN
 |name=兽人匕首
 |tile=[[image:orcish dagger.png]]
 |appearance=粗糙匕首
 |smalldmg=1d3

 |tohit=<nowiki>+2</nowiki>
 |cost=4
 |weight=10
 |material=铁
 |color=black
 |skill=匕首
}}
'''兽人匕首'''（orcish dagger）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[武器]]。它使用[[匕首]]的武器[[技能]]，和匕首一样既可用于[[近战]]也可用作[[发射物]]。兽人匕首由[[铁]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时，它的外观为'''粗糙匕首'''（crude dagger）。

[[邪兽之牙]]是一种[[神器武器|神器]]类兽人匕首。

== 生成 ==
[[兽人（起始种族）|兽人]]族的玩家在游戏开始时即鉴定兽人匕首{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|858|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。兽人族[[游侠]]在游戏开始时会获得一把+1兽人匕首，兽人族[[盗贼]]则会获得一堆+0兽人匕首{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|114|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|125|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|213|nethack=3.6.7|comment=起始物品根据角色种族而发生替换}}。

兽人匕首在随机生成的武器中占1.2%。

[[兽人（怪物类别）|兽人]]在生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]一把兽人匕首（[[兽人萨满]]除外）{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|426|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

所有[[玩家怪物]]在生成时有约1%的概率获得一把兽人匕首{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|155|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[盗贼（玩家怪物）|盗贼]]职业的玩家怪物的起始武器有{{frac|4}}的概率会是一把兽人匕首{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|229|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

== 策略 ==
兽人匕首一般是玩家最早会在地牢里获得的武器之一。它对所有怪物的伤害都是d3，是游戏中最弱的武器之一。对于需要在游戏前期锻炼匕首技能的角色，兽人匕首仍有一定实用性。兽人族使用匕首有[[多重射击]]加成，因此兽人盗贼玩家可以考虑在得到一堆更好的匕首之前利用自带的兽人匕首。

== 历史 ==
兽人匕首最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], upgrading an orcish dagger will produce a standard dagger.

Kobolds in SLASH'EM have an effective {{frac|3|8}} chance of generating with an orcish dagger.{{refsrc|makemon.c|851|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], orcish daggers deal d3 damage to small monsters and d5 to large monsters, and have a +1 to-hit bonus. Orcish characters in roles that would start with daggers, [[knives]] or [[athame]]s will instead start with orcish daggers replacing each of them.

Grimtooth can be created by naming any orcish dagger, and favors orcs. It has +d5 to-hit, warns of [[Elf (monster attribute)|elves]], [[Dwarf (monster attribute)|dwarves]] and [[Human (monster attribute)|humans]] while carried, and deals double damage against them; it can also be [[twoweapon]]ed in the offhand.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], an orcish dagger can be created at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining 2 [[orcish arrow]]s and a knife. Orcish daggers can be used at a forge to create a few items:

* An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 orcish arrows to create an [[orcish spear]].
* An orcish dagger can be combined with 2 [[crossbow bolt]]s to create an [[orcish short sword]].
* An orcish dagger can be combined with a [[mace]] to create an [[orcish morning star]].
* An orcish dagger can be combined with a [[dented pot]] to create an [[orcish helm]].

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], upgrading a [[great dagger]] will produce an orcish dagger. Forging recipes are the same as in EvilHack.

== 引用及注释 ==
<references/>
{{nethack-367/zh-CN}}
[[Category:Weapons/zh-CN|SHOURENBISHOU]]
[[Category:Orcish items/zh-CN|BISHOU]]
